page.title: 12Stanton-under-Bardon School
page.content: The village{Primary School}takes children from{four to ten years of {age,}when they transfer to{South {Charnwood High School. There are fifty-three children in the school split into{three classes}with {a teaching Head,}two teachers and a {Nursery Nurse.}There is a part-time secretary and a part-time ancillary helper. Two dinner ladies help us with our meals,and look after us during lunchtime. Our dinners are delivered by car from {South Charnwood High School}at 11.30 a.m. and are kept in the oven until 12.00 midday,when we have our lunch. We start school at{09.00am}every week-day.We have a break at 10.30am and also after dinner time.Afternoon school starts at 1.30pm and school finishes at{3.30pm.
